abstract.shortdesc: If you want to work on topics and maps in a different branch, use the Change Branch action in the view toolbar.
abstract.note: You cannot switch to a different branch if the current branch has any unstaged modifications.

taskbody.prereq: If the current branch has any unstaged changes, commit your modifications or discard them entirely.

step.cmd: In the view toolbar, click the Change Branch icon.
In the Select Branch dialog box, select the branch that you want to check out and click OK.
